author: p0W3RH311
body:
Hi guys

$PSLogUserData and $LogSettingsEvent are two built-in  variable, the uniq information i have is for [logging ](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/System.Management.Automation/engine/SpecialVariables.cs) but there is no example of using these variables. what is their purpose? and how to use them? are there any examples of use case


thanks

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: If they are not documented, you can only see in the code how they are used. Although maybe it's outdated code.

title: mysterious variable
